briefdescription.para: Allocates a new csc matrix and copies A to it.
Allocates a new csc matrix that is lambda * I.
Frees all the internal arrays and the pointer to the QOCOCscMatrix. Should only be used if QOCOCscMatrix and all internal arrays were malloc'ed.
Copies array of QOCOFloats from x to array y.
Copies and negates array of QOCOFloats from x to array y.
Copies array of QOCOInts from x to array y.
Computes dot product of u and v.

simplesect.para: Dot product of u and v.

briefdescription.para: Computes maximum element of array of QOCOInts.

memberdef.argsstring: (const QOCOFloat *x, QOCOFloat *y, QOCOFloat s, QOCOInt n)
memberdef.name: scale_arrayf

briefdescription.para: Scales array x by s and stores result in y. y = s * x.

memberdef.argsstring: (const QOCOFloat *x, const QOCOFloat *y, QOCOFloat *z, QOCOFloat a, QOCOInt n)
memberdef.name: axpy

briefdescription.para: Computes z = a * x + y.
Sparse matrix vector multiplication for CSC matrices where M is symmetric and only the upper triangular part is given. Computes r = M * v.

parameterdescription.para: Upper triangular part of M in CSC form.

briefdescription.para: Sparse matrix vector multiplication for CSC matrices. Computes r = M * v.
Sparse matrix vector multiplication for CSC matrices where M is first transposed. Computes r = M^T * v.
Computes the infinity norm of x.
Adds lambda * I to a CSC matrix. Called on P prior to construction of KKT system in qoco_setup(). This function calls realloc() when adding new nonzeros.

parameterdescription.para: Indices of elements of M->x that are added.

simplesect.para: Number of nonzeros added to M->x.

briefdescription.para: Subtracts lambda * I to a CSC matrix. Called on P when updating matrix data in update_matrix_data(). This function does not allocate and must be called after regularize.
Computes the infinity norm of each column (or equivalently row) of a symmetric sparse matrix M where only the upper triangular portion of M is given.

parameterdescription.para: Upper triangular part of sparse symmetric matrix.

briefdescription.para: Computes the infinity norm of each row of M and stores in norm.

parameterdescription.para: An m by n sparse matrix.

briefdescription.para: Allocates and computes A^T.
Scales the rows of M by E and columns of M by D. M = diag(E) * M * diag(S)

parameterdescription.para: An m by n sparse matrix.

briefdescription.para: Computes elementwise product z = x .* y.
Inverts permutation vector p and stores inverse in pinv.
Computes cumulative sum of c.
C = A(p,p) = PAP' where A and C are symmetric and the upper triangular part is stored.
